Discovered a Local File Inclusion (LFI) vulnerability in a file upload feature on a web application
Uploaded a PHP file with a crafted name containing the relative path to sensitive system files
Accessed download link for the uploaded file and the application included contents of the sensitive file in the server response
Used LFI attack to gain access to sensitive information and potentially compromise the security of the web application and the underlying system
Recommended application implements proper input validation and sanitation techniques to prevent LFI attacks
Recommended application enforces strict file type and size limits and stores files outside of the web root directory to prevent access to sensitive system files
